title: How to make voice assistant play an mp3 via my chosen music player?
content:
When I activate the voice assistant and say "Listen to [name of mp3 song downloaded to my phone]", my Pixel 3a would always only launch YouTube Music. I didn't want that, so I uninstalled YouTube Music. Then when I tried the same thing again, it launched YouTube. WHY DOES THE PIXEL THINK MUSIC SHOULD BE PLAYED THROUGH YOUTUBE?? This makes no sense.

I have 2 music apps: Google Play Music and Musicolet. I would be fine with either. When I ask voice assistant to play an mp3 song, I want it to launch Musicolet or Google Play Music and begin playing my chosen mp3. How can I make it do this?

Thanks in advance.
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 3a
